title: autonomous-system
description: The AS object represents the properties of an Autonomous Systems (AS).

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `autonomous-system`.

number.description: Specifies the number assigned to the AS. Such assignments are typically performed by a Regional Internet Registries (RIR).

name.description: Specifies the name of the AS.

rir.description: Specifies the name of the Regional Internet Registry (RIR) that assigned the number to the AS.
